title: f4n.dev Blog Tags Specification
description: The specification for tags used in f4n.dev blog, such as caveats, tech tags.

$schema.description: The Path/URL for the scheme of 'f4n.dev Blog Tags Specification'.

caveats.description: Caveats. Notifies the user that the article or the content in it might contain some information that requires extra caution when reading / understanding.

emoji.description: The emoji that symbols the caveats.

header.description: The captions and labels shown if it's used in the `caveats` front-matter.

description.description: The caption shown on the header of the articles when the caveat is used in the `caveat` front-matter

label.description: The label shown on the header of the articles when the caveat is used in the `caveat` front-matter. Should be English term.

inline.description: The captions and labels shown if it's used inside the content of the article.

description.description: The caption shown on the header of the articles when the caveat is used in the content of the article

background.description: Background text shown on the background of the section where the caveat is applied.

techs.description: Technologies. Annotates the article what technology is related / used in the blog content.

name.description: The name of the technology. Primary language is English, but not limited to it.

emoji.description: The emoji that symbols the technology.
